nodes.title: Revert "Add explicit methods to avoid cast when the type inference is ambiguous"
Add explicit methods to avoid cast when the type inference is ambiguous
[WIP] Replace Either with vavr's Either as an optional dependency
Support adding arguments in the errorMessage for custom constraints
Support conditional constraints on nested fields
Added Automatic-Module-Name entry to the generated manifest file
Accept ArgumentsNValidator to validate null args
Implements a first draft of a validator Kotlin DSL
Fix problem with checking nested constraint condition when nested target is null
Introduce `ValueValidator` as a super interface of `ApplicativeValidator` and `Arguments1Validator`
Add constraints for Password, IPv4, IPv6 and Luhn
Fix lost field name from validation result when conditional constraint is used
Fix deep nested object validation for n-layers nested object.
Auto constraint name resolution for extracting method references [concept]
Append nested collection validators to the main validator
Support Java 14 in CI instead of 13
Append method name to meta class generated
Make ConstraintMetaProcessor work with inner classes
Add a Codacy badge to README.md
Add "Validating method arguments" example in the doc
Add Annotation Processor to generate constraints metadata
